Articles.Content:
Whenever I try to run KSP in Dx11 or OpenGL all the part icons in the editor become light blue. I also get a lot of micro stutters, especially noticeable when panning the camera.
I haven't touched the Dx11 or opengl settings much but have alway ran into this issue when running ksp on both rendering modes. There's nothing I know that solves it. I really want this to work because it halves my memory usage.

It is the same issue this guy on steam is having but no cause/solution was provided https://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/discussions/0/1698293068429306154/

I have to much superior computer hardware to justify any stuttering so it isn't that. Just stating in case someone has to know.

8700k OC @4.95ghz
16gb ram
GTX 1080 TI

Edited September 5, 2018 by Aeroboi
For the parts icons you can try the fix linked to in this thread.

@mystifeid That's what I was missing and it surely did the trick.

FYI it also fixed the stuttering issue so the fix goes further then only mending the part icons
